metadata.title: Bojianzzha School Bus Stainless Steel Tumbler Thermos Vacuum Insulated Cup Tea Travel Cup Travel Coffee Mug for Adult/Children 20 oz pattern12 20oz
description: Size - 20oz, Package included 1 cup. Proprietary technology keeps ice cold and steam hot longer. Fits most Car Cup holders and will be your perfect companion to outdoor activities, such as fishing, hunting, hiking, camping; also great to work and to chill at home. If you have any problem with our tumbler(whether before and after sale), please contact us at anytime.
